meanings.definition: To produce (a film, television show, etc.) jointly with another person or organization.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I coproduce a podcast every week.
meanings.sent2: The two companies decided to coproduce a new movie together.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors coproduce a community newsletter that always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration to coproduce the event was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The team's ability to coproduce seamlessly impressed everyone.

meanings.definition: To work together with someone to create something.
meanings.sent1: We coproduce handmade crafts to sell at the market.
meanings.sent2: The students coproduce a play for the school talent show.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coproduce a delicious meal in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork to coproduce the project was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The artists coproduce stunning paintings that capture the essence of nature.
